MRI module¶

MRI_1.kspace_to_image(kspace)[source]¶

This function converts k-space data to image space.

Parameters: - kspace (numpy.ndarray): The k-space data.

Returns: - image (numpy.ndarray): The image space data.

MRI_1.main(data_path, output_path='graph')[source]¶
MRI_2.butterworth_lowpass_filter(shape, D0=30, n=2)[source]¶

This function creates a Butterworth lowpass filter.

Parameters: - shape (tuple): The shape of the filter. - D0 (float): The cutoff frequency. - n (int): The order of the filter.

Returns: - H (numpy.ndarray): The Butterworth lowpass filter.

MRI_2.kspace_to_image(kspace)[source]¶

This function converts k-space data to image space.

Parameters: - kspace (numpy.ndarray): The k-space data.

Returns: - image (numpy.ndarray): The image space data.
